subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Steroids
lead_paragraph: Paolo Bettini will attempt to win back-to-back titles in a host city that tried to kick him out of the cycling world championships, and Óscar Freire will try to make history with a record fourth title.
snippet: Paolo Bettini will attempt to win back-to-back titles in a host city that tried to kick him out of the cycling world championships, and Óscar Freire will try to make history with a record fourth title.
